titleStmt.title: The Two petitions of the county of Buckingham: as they were presented to both Houses, by knights, esquires, captaines, and gentlemen, with a very great number of freeholders, being the true copy as it was presented to the Houses of Parliament, Ianuary 11. 1641. As also the humble petition of the marriners and sea-men, inhabitants in and about the ports of London, and the river Thames. Together with the petition of the foure Innes of Court.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
